title: TikTok Refugee Geographic Characteristic Research
text: The term “TikTok Refugees” describes a growing demographic of users who have migrated their digital presence from TikTok to RedNote (Xiaohongshu). This research explores the drivers behind this cross-platform migration, focusing on how geographic characteristics and privacy perceptions influence their transition between a US-based and a China-based ecosystem.

title: TikTok Refugee Geographic Characteristic Research
text: The term “TikTok Refugees” describes a growing demographic of users who have migrated their digital presence from TikTok to RedNote (Xiaohongshu). title: My Data Science Blog
text:
TikTok Refugee Geographic Characteristic Research



Digital Migration

Social Media

RedNote

Data Visualization



This study investigates the online community migration of ‘TikTok Refugees’, users moving from TikTok (a US-based app) to RedNote (a China-based app). The research explores their motivations, platform usage, and privacy perceptions through a structured survey of 130 valid participants (N=130).

title: TikTok Refugee Geographic Characteristic Research
text:
Project Progress (Week 7)
This week, I focused on moving from raw data to a structured project environment. The following milestones have been achieved:

Website Framework Setup: Successfully deployed the initial Quarto blog structure and project repository. The platform is now ready to host interactive components and research updates.
Data Cleaning: Processed the raw survey data from 130 valid participants (\(N=130\)). Key tasks included:

Standardizing geographic tags for mapping.
Cleaning and categorizing platform usage frequency and duration.

Visualization Planning: Currently designing the exploratory data analysis phase.
